name: Code For PDX
title: An app for use by Clackamas County to monitor public health

projects.name: An app that will be used by Clackamas County for monitoring public health. It scrapes social media and identifies areas with high insidences of symptoms of Hepatitis A
projects.techsUsed: Javascript, Node.js, React, glamorous, webpack, git, bash

name: Color Wheel Graph
title: React app to graph complex functions using domain coloring

projects.name: A front end that leverages the Calculator App to graph complex functions. This was an app that I used as a visual aid during a talk on Taylor Series where I displayed the graphs of complex functions and their Taylor series using color wheel graphs (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domain_coloring).
projects.techsUsed: Javascript, Node.js, React, webpack, git, bash

name: Calculator App
title: Node.js program that can solve complex polynomial equations

projects.name: A calculator that I built to use Javascripts built in Math object to build a Polynomial object with methods for performing arithmetic on polynomials and finding complex number solutions for up to third order polynomials.
projects.techsUsed: Javascript, Node.js, git, bash, Jasmine (replaced with mocha), Mocha, Chai
